text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Welcome all to the First Fantasy<n>Kinen. I'm Mystic Granny,
and I'll be<n>your commentator for today.

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but suddenly I am filled with a<n>sense of foreboding.
Come,<n>Umamusume. Altogether now...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What's goin' on? Grass! My<n>startin' gate won't
open!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Is this... an arcane lock spell? Is that<n>allowed?!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I'll just cast Unlock. Now go! Hurry,<n>El!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whoa, you're a lifesaver! Okay. Imma<n>get you, Uma Lord!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Welp, guess I'll just summon my<n>Uma Minions! Go get
'em, guys!

text_block_list.name: Uma Minions
text_block_list.text: Uma! Uma Uma!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yikes, that's no bueno! I'm<n>completely surrounded, but I'll
try and<n>break through with my Condor<n>fighting techniques!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hiyaaah! Hiyooooh! Wataaaah!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... I'm runnin' outtasteam!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Greater Heal!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for the backup, Grass! I'm<n>startin' to get the hang
of this pattern!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Fiddlesticks! Useless cronies! Guess<n>this is a job only a
lord can finish!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Hiyaaah! Eat this! Earthquake!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I won't let you do that! Portal Shift!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ohh, you saved me! Let's finish this,<n>once and for all!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: You won't get away with this! The<n>real race starts now!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Picklestones! Descend from the vast<n>cosmos! Meteor
Strike!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Not on my watch! I'll shield us—Holy<n>Barrier!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Crafty, aren't we? I'll have to kick it<n>up a notch, then!
Meteor Storm!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Gaaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Where am I now? Did I get<n>one-shotted? That
suuucks...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You can't die, El! This isn't the time<n>to be messing around
in Umadegard!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Full Revival!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I'm ready for more!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
What? You're back from the dead?<n>Seems like I'd better
prioritize taking<n>out Grass first.

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah! Dark Celestial Orb!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Gyaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Graaaaass!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El... don't look back! Umamusume run<n>for something... more
precious than a<n>friend's life, right?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
So go on without me. I may not be<n>able to heal you anymore,
but I can<n>give you... my hope.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: GRASS!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! While you're busy with that<n>pity party of yours, I'll
be on my way!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Noooo! Stop right there!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
What?! How are you accelerating so<n>fast? I thought you'd
used up all your<n>skills!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I don't need any fantasy skills! This<n>is a race, the place
where an<n>Umamusume's true magic shines!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: What matters most is power and<n>endurance!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Whoooaaa! Impossible!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No obstacle can hold us back!<n>Carryin' the hopes of our
fallen<n>friends, us Umamusume will put our<n>lives on the
line! All for one thing...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: And one thing alone! VICTORY!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
And she's crossed the finish line! El<n>Condor Pasa takes the
win! I can see<n>it crystal clear, even with my poor<n>eyesight!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text: Pretty sure your eyesight has been<n>fine this entire time!

text_block_list.name: Uma Lord Golshi
text_block_list.text:
Darn it! I lost... But I live to fight<n>another day! Just you wait
and see!
